Central nervous system (CNS)    Signs or symptoms of LCH that affects the CNS (brain and spinal cord) may include:            - Loss of balance, uncoordinated body movements, and trouble walking.     - Trouble speaking.     - Trouble seeing.     - Headaches.     - Changes in behavior or personality.     - Memory prob
